column1: Kelkheim German: [ˈkɛlk.haɪ̯m] (listen) is a town in the Main-Taunus district in Hesse
Located on the southwestern slopes of the Taunus mountains
column2: Kelkheim is noted for its attractive scenery. Kelkheim is located approximately 10 km to the west of Frankfurt. Wiesbaden

column1: Kelkheim is subdivided into six boroughs Kelkheim-Mitte
Kelkheim is twinned to the following towns:
Kelkheim station is connected to both Frankfurt and Königstein by rail
column2: while bus connections exist to Eppstein
column4: Liederbach and Sulzbach. Frankfurt Airport serves as the city's main international airport and is located near to Kelkheim.

column1: There is literature about Kelkheim in the Hessian Bibliography
